c:attribute.name: weatherRadios
c:attribute.description: The set of weather radio devices in the place

c:attribute.name: weatherAlert
c:attribute.description: Indicates the whether any weather radios are currently alerting - READY - No weather radios are alerting - ALERT - One or more weather radios are alerting

c:attribute.name: alertingRadios
c:attribute.description: A map of NWS EAS event codes for the current alert to the devices that are reporting that alert

c:attribute.name: lastWeatherAlertTime
c:attribute.description: The last time a weather alert was raised

c:method.name: SnoozeAllAlerts
c:method.description: Send a stopplaying request to each station that is playing a weather alert.
